skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 1 turn.
skills.name: Maul
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Ice Pillar

skills.desc: Immune to [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep] debuffs. Decreases the damage taken by all allies that are under 1 or more buffs by 15%. Decreases the damage taken by all allies that are under no active buffs by 25%.
skills.name: Thick Skin [Passive]

skills.desc: Immune to [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep] debuffs. Decreases the damage taken by all allies by 15%.
skills.name: Thick Skin [Passive]
